name: tienda-online
description: Tienda online b√°sica con React, Node.js y MySQL

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run build && serve -s build"
